amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure none of the funds made available by the Act may be used to research, investigate, or study offshore drilling in the Eastern Gulf of Mexico Planning Area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graham amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 243 (Roll no. 447).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. Graham.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Graham amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 243 (Roll no. 447).
